DataElement.preferredName: Arizona Tobacco Survey Times Smoked Pipe or Cigar per Week Usage Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term that represents the category of weekly pipe or cigar usage.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Arizona Tobacco Survey Times Smoked Pipe or Cigar per Week
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A random, computerized, telephone survey of Arizona residents over 18 years old, conducted in 1996 and 1999, designed to track changes in tobacco use, the knowledge and opinions of Arizona residents about tobacco use, and the proportion of smokers advised to quit smoking by healthcare providers._A question about how many times per week an individual smokes or smoked a pipe and/or cigar.
